dmca.title: Following your rules...
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 3:05:16 p.m.
(GMT-6) on October 27, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

 


________________________________

From: kitton66@gmail.com [mailto:kitton66@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Molly
Wens
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 11:10 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Following your rules...
Subject: Following your rules...



*        A physical or electronic signature of a person ("Complaining
Party") authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right
that is claimed to be infringed; 

I am Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, the author and exclusive owner of all
rights to the story, The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1 and I am acting
on my own behalf.

*        Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been
infringed, or if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at
that site; 

The story in question and the reason for this email is The Spell of
Appalachia, Chapter 1, containing the following text: 

(Dear Reader, 

This story is an adaptation of the various tales my Grandmother used to
tell me about the magic in the Smoky Mountains. I hope you enjoy it as
much as I enjoyed hearing her "give the tell", as she called it. 

Parts 2 and 3 will follow immediately. As always, it has been my most
profound joy bringing you this story. Please take just a moment to vote
at the end. Also, I take great pleasure in reading your comments so
please feel free to tell me how you feel. 

-SweetWitch)

*

It was a gorgeous cabin, huge and sprawling and made of native pine logs
and oak paneling. It was built directly into the side of the mountain
and its great balcony over-looked the valley below. She went there
whenever her soul needed solace and peace. She had spent many long and
secluded months there throughout the past three years. It had magical
healing powers that could restore what society and modern life would
take from her.

It was on such a visit as she stood upon her balcony in the pre-dawn
mists when reality and magic seemed to couple, creating a realm where
dreams ruled and mystical creatures stirred in the fog. 

She looked out.....

*        Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing
or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or
access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient
to permit the service provider to locate the material; 

The website that has stolen my work is Starznaked.com.  The Spell of
Appalachia, Chapter 1 can be found at the following URL:  
http://starznaked.com/2006/10/11/the_spell_of_appalachia_ch_01/#more-594
, where no permission has been given to post said story.
 
Please note the pornographic imagery on the top of this and all pages
associated with this site.  I have no desire to have my work associated
with this type of material.

*        Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider
to contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number,
and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining
party may be contacted; 

I may be reached at 217-652-0428 or my email address 
molly.wens@gmail.com.

*        
        A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; 

I, Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, Sole Author and Owner of all rights to
and copyrights of The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1, do not now give
nor have I ever given my permission or authorization to the owners,
operators or other persons in any way involved with Starznaked.com to
publish or post my story.

*        A statement that the information in the notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. 

I, Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, Sole Author and Owner of all rights to
and copyrights of The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1, do hereby attest
that the information in this statement of notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, am acting on my own behalf. 
 
I await your reply.
 
Molly Wens.
